title: HotNews WordPress Theme (Professional 2 Columns Theme)
description:
HotNews is a trendy, news magazine and breaking news style WordPress blog theme. With a slider, numerous post widgets, a touch of color and plenty of contrast to improve readability, HotNews is perfect for bloggers with text content, media content, and who want to have full control over what homepage posts are displayed.


HotNews Features:

Magazine Style
HotNews WordPress theme includes a sleek featured posts slider, and a dual column magazine layout.

Options Panels
Like all MyThemeShop themes, HotNews includes our custom options panel so you can customize your theme easily.

Integrated Social Media
Promote your site easily using the built in social media buttons, which allow your readers to help promote the content they like from your site.


Shortcodes
Add highlights and features to your posts with a click, using the shortcodes that are included in HotNews.


SEO Optimized
Google is becoming harder and harder for bloggers to deal with, but HotNews makes it simple to get top SEO rankings.

Speed
With lazy loading, optimized code and a clean design, HotNews will put all other themes to shame with its loading time.


Custom Widgets
Add sidebar widgets without having to use extra plugins. HotNews includes the most popular sidebar widgets that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve customized for added power.

Related Posts
Get your users engaged, by showing them more posts and keeping them on your site for longer.


Ad Optimized
Maximize your advertising earnings and keep your readership happy at the same time, with HotNewsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ad optimisation.


Featured Posts Slider
Show off your best posts with the slick featured posts slider, guaranteed to get more clicks from your readers.


Responsive
HotNews is 100% responsive, meaning it works on any browser or window size. No more tinkering with plugins or half-working themes.
